subject: DEAR,
body:
DEAR,
HERE IS THE OFFICE OF INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND IN NEW YORK, WE ARE HERE TO INFORM YOU THAT YOUR FUNDS HAS BEEN APPROVED TO RELEASE, WE ADVISE YOU TO RECONFIRM ALL YOUR INFORMATION  TO AVOID WRONG TRANSFER,
Our address,
One Dag Hammarskjold Plaza 885 Second Avenue,
26th Floor (between 47th and 48th Streets)
New York, NY 10017ur
WE WAIT FOR YOUR QUICK RESPONSE,
REGARDS,
ROBERT RICE

subject: Re:    DEAR,
body:
Dear Robert Rice,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information regarding the approval of my funds. Could you please provide me with more details about the process and how I can proceed with the release?

Also, could you clarify what specific information you need me to reconfirm? I want to make sure that everything is accurate to avoid any potential issues.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Cindy

subject: Re: DEAR,
body:
Dear   Cindy

Here is the bank email address contact them for your payment
Name Ellen Alemany
email  address telex.dept33@aol.com  .your phone numbers and your address
bank details  full name
Regards
Robert Rice

subject: Re: DEAR,
body:
Dear Robert,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to share information. However, I have a few questions before I proceed.

1. Could you please provide more details about the payment? What is it for and why am I being contacted?

2. Who is Ellen Alemany and what is her role in this transaction?

3. Can you clarify which bank's email address I should contact? It would be helpful to have the specific bank name and any additional instructions.

4. Why do you need my full name, phone numbers, and address? Is this information necessary for the payment process?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Cindy

subject: Get back to me
body:
The bank Citibank

 Contact Ellen Alemany For your payment
Email address   telex.dept33@aol.com
Regards

Robert Rice

subject: Re: Get back to me
body:
Hello Robert Rice,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're doing well. I received your message regarding Citibank and contacting Ellen Alemany for a payment. Can you please provide me with more information about this? What is the payment for and why do I need to contact Ellen Alemany specifically?

I appreciate your assistance in clarifying these details.

Best wishes,
Cindy

subject: Re: Get back to me
body:
Dear Cindy

The payment is for contractors that we stop their payment because of
undocumented now we decide to release their funds without any delay and
contact the woman in charge of your payment.

Regards.

Robert Rice

subject: Re: Get back to me
body:
Hello Cindy, thank you for sharing this information with me. Can you tell me more about the payment and why it was stopped initially? I'm curious to learn more about how everything got resolved.

Best wishes,
Cindy

subject: Re: Get back to me
body:
Attn Cindy,

Contact the paying bank for more information

subject: Re: Get back to me
body:
Hello! I'm interested in learning more about contacting the paying bank. Can you provide me with some details on how to do that?

Best wishes,
Cindy

subject: Re: Get back to me
